note: This data is expressed in [international-$](#dod:int_dollar_abbreviation) at 2021 prices.
title: Poverty: Share of population living on less than $4.20 a day (after tax)
subtitle: The poverty line of $4.20 per day is set by the World Bank to be representative of the definitions of poverty adopted in lower-middle-income countries. This data is adjusted for inflation and differences in living costs between countries. Income here is measured after taxes and benefits.
